name: code-binder
description: Code Binder combines multiple source files into a single file, simplifying code sharing for AI-based debugging services like ChatGPT.

code-binder.folders.description: List of folders to include when binding code

code-binder.files.description: List of individual files to include when binding code

code-binder.includeExtension.description: Include only files with this file extension when binding code

code-binder.excludeExtension.description: Exclude files with this file extension when binding code

code-binder.outputFileName.description: Output file name for the combined code

code-binder.prependText.description: Text to be added at the top of the output file

code-binder.appendText.description: Text to be added at the bottom of the output file

code-binder.printFullPath.description: Print the full path of the files in the output file

printFolderStructure.description: Print the folder structure in the output file

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
